entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
